# {.tabset} 

## Renter Cost Burden

### {.tabset}

#### Count

```{r hhcount count}

hhc_re <- create_plots("renter-cost-burden", 1, "count")

hhc_re_hhsize <- create_plots("renter-cost-burden", 2, "count")

iwalk(hhc_re$plots, ~print(.x))

iwalk(hhc_re_hhsize$plots, ~print(.x))

```

#### Shares

```{r hhcount share}

hhs_re <- create_plots("renter-cost-burden", 1, "share")

hhs_re_hhsize <- create_plots("renter-cost-burden", 2, "share")

iwalk(hhs_re$plots, ~print(.x))

iwalk(hhs_re_hhsize$plots, ~print(.x))

```
